availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John D. Edwards (Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer and juror)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer and juror. Virginia native. Married to Nancy T. Shelton Edwards in Trigg County, Kentucky, on October 7, 1833. Father of Eliza A. Edwards, James M. Edwards, Charles Edwards, Sally Edwards, Robertson Edwards, and John H. Edwards. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850. Farmer in Trigg County in 1860. Juror in the Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Thomas B. Wadlington in Caldwell County on December 8, 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 305A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 87.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film #000321335, p. 46.
Find A Grave, "John D. Edwards (1798-1868)," Memorial #49509180, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/49509180 (accessed May 27, 2021).
KYR-0001-020-0001.
